title: An antique pistol fatality: consideration of the legal and pathological aspects: a case report.
abstract: This article presents a case report of a shooting using an antique pistol. The unusual pathological findings are presented, together with a review of the law in this area. It seems that there is currently a loophole in the 1997 Firearms Act by means of which 'enthusiasts' or 'collectors' may legally possess weapons and then subsequently acquire ammunition illegally.

authors.name: Deborah S Cook
affiliations: Wales Institute of Forensic Medicine, University of Wales College of Medicine, Cardiff CF14 4XN.
